name: part_009
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】あくあ色すーぱーみらくる☆どり〜む♪【#湊あくあ3Dライブ 】 [gf7RSwmp8dM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Aqua Iro Super Miracle Dream'.
Minato Aqua provides commentary and makes announcements about new merchandise.

subtitles.original: どじだしたメタメタだけど
subtitles.english: I've become a bit clumsy and messy, but...

subtitles.original: それでも私のことを見ててね
subtitles.english: ...still, please keep watching me.

subtitles.original: 描く夢の
subtitles.english: Of the dreams I draw,

subtitles.original: 未来へ続く道を
subtitles.english: the path leading to the future...

subtitles.original: 君と歩けますように
subtitles.english: I hope I can walk it with you.

subtitles.original: ねぇもっと好きになってもらいたいの
subtitles.english: Hey, I want you to like me more.

subtitles.original: 頭の中は君ばっかてやば
subtitles.english: My head is filled with only you, it's crazy.

subtitles.original: そっぽなんて向いてないであーもうヤキモキしちゃうわ
subtitles.english: Don't look away, oh geez, I'm getting impatient.

subtitles.original: あーあ
subtitles.english: Ah-ah...

subtitles.original: ずっとずっと好きがいいの
subtitles.english: I want to be liked forever and ever.

subtitles.original: 心の奥もトキめいちゃうくらいに
subtitles.english: So much that even the depths of my heart throb.

subtitles.original: こっち向いててよ四六時中
subtitles.english: Look this way, twenty-four seven.

subtitles.original: あーもう離さないから絶対に
subtitles.english: Ah, I'll never let go, absolutely.

subtitles.original: LOVE YOU LOVE YOU OH OH OH OH
subtitles.english: LOVE YOU LOVE YOU OH OH OH OH

subtitles.original: I LOVE YOU OH OH OH OH
subtitles.english: I LOVE YOU OH OH OH OH

subtitles.original: 愛してるもっと
subtitles.english: I love you more.

subtitles.original: 君がいるから私
subtitles.english: Because you're here, I...

subtitles.original: いつでも頑張れるんだ
subtitles.english: ...can always do my best.

subtitles.original: 落ち込んで悲しくたって
subtitles.english: Even if I'm feeling down and sad,

subtitles.original: 君がいるから
subtitles.english: because you're here.

subtitles.original: みんな！今日は3Dライブ来てくれて本当にありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thank you so much for coming to the 3D live today!

subtitles.original: 最後まであくあ色に染まれー！
subtitles.english: Be dyed in Aqua's color until the very end!

subtitles.original: 君がいるから歩いてこれた
subtitles.english: I've been able to walk this far because you're here.

subtitles.original: 君がいなくちゃ前も見れない
subtitles.english: Without you, I can't even see ahead.

subtitles.original: 嫌なこととか辛いこととかあったって
subtitles.english: Even when there were bad things or painful things,

subtitles.original: 君の力でここまで笑ってこれたんだ
subtitles.english: I've been able to come this far laughing thanks to your strength.

subtitles.original: 今度はもっと私がグッと引っ張って
subtitles.english: This time, I'll pull you along even more

subtitles.original: 連れて行くんだ
subtitles.english: and take you with me.

subtitles.original: 君がいるから私がいるの
subtitles.english: I exist because you're here.

subtitles.original: こんな私を
subtitles.english: Someone like me,

subtitles.original: 愛してくれるね
subtitles.english: you'll love me, right?

subtitles.original: もっともっとまだまだ受け止めてよねー
subtitles.english: More and more, keep accepting me, okay?

subtitles.original: さぁ声を上げて
subtitles.english: Now, raise your voice!

subtitles.original: ねぇもっとねぇもっと
subtitles.english: Hey more, hey more!

subtitles.original: 好きになってもらいたいの
subtitles.english: I want you to like me more.

subtitles.original: いつでもそう私ばっか見てたい
subtitles.english: I want to look only at me all the time.

subtitles.original: そっぽなんて向かせないわ
subtitles.english: I won't let you look away,

subtitles.original: ねぇほら夢中にしちゃうわ
subtitles.english: hey look, I'll make you obsessed.

subtitles.original: あーあ
subtitles.english: Ah-ah...

subtitles.original: ずっとずっと好きがいいの
subtitles.english: I want to be liked forever and ever.

subtitles.original: 心も体も染まっちゃうくらいに
subtitles.english: So much that your heart and body are dyed.

subtitles.original: こっち向いててよ四六時中
subtitles.english: Look this way, twenty-four seven.

subtitles.original: あーもう離さないから絶対に
subtitles.english: Ah, I'll never let go, absolutely.

subtitles.original: 絶対ね
subtitles.english: Definitely,

subtitles.original: 絶対よ
subtitles.english: I mean it!

subtitles.original: 約束ー！
subtitles.english: Promise!

subtitles.original: I LOVE YOU OH OH OH OH
subtitles.english: I LOVE YOU OH OH OH OH

subtitles.original: 愛しちゃうもっと
subtitles.english: I'll love you more.

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original:
湊あくあ 3Dライブ 2021
あくあ色 すーぱーみらくる どり〜む♪
subtitles.english:
Minato Aqua 3D Live 2021
Aqua Iro Super Miracle Dream

subtitles.original: 皆さんどうもこんあくあー！湊あくあでーす！
subtitles.english: Hello everyone, Kon-Aqua! I'm Minato Aqua!

subtitles.original: ということで、「あくあ色すーぱーみらくる☆どり〜む♪」楽しんでいただけましたか？
subtitles.english: So, did you enjoy "Aqua Iro Super Miracle Dream"?

subtitles.original: 当日の彼女はきっと緊張して
subtitles.english: I think she on that day is probably so nervous...

subtitles.original: 胃が張り裂けそうな気持ちになっていると思うので、よかったら温かいコメントいっぱいしてくれたら嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: ...that her stomach feels like it's going to burst, so I'd be happy if you could leave lots of warm comments!

subtitles.original: て終わってんのかもう。ははっ
subtitles.english: Wait, is it over already? Haha.

subtitles.original: ということで、ここからは告知タイム！
subtitles.english: So, from here it's announcement time!

subtitles.original: 重大告知もあるので、よかったら最後までお見逃しなく！
subtitles.english: There are major announcements too, so please don't miss out until the end!

subtitles.original: それじゃあ告知その一、行ってみましょう。デデン！
subtitles.english: Then, let's go with announcement number one. Ta-da!

subtitles.original:
NEKO BIG ぬいぐるみ
5月9日販売開始
subtitles.english:
NEKO BIG Plushie
Sales start May 9th

subtitles.original: 先ほど3Dライブで出てきた「NEKO」3D化を記念して
subtitles.english: To commemorate the 3D-ification of "NEKO" that appeared in the 3D live just now...

subtitles.original: 「NEKO BIGぬいぐるみ」が遂に発売されます！
subtitles.english: ...the "NEKO BIG Plushie" is finally being released!

subtitles.original: 全長約45cm。約45... あれ？「約」ってなんだろう。うーん。
subtitles.english: Total length approx. 45cm. Approx. 45... wait? I wonder what "approx" means. Hmm.

subtitles.original: ということで、こちらは概要欄より購入できますので...
subtitles.english: So, you can purchase this from the description section...
